name: Homemade Oat Milk
description: Let me show you how to make oat milk at home! With this recipe you can make creamy, smooth, and delicious homemade oat milk with just 4 easy ingredients. It takes only 5 minutes and it's perfect for breakfast, coffee, or baking!

recipeInstructions.text: Place the oats, the dates, and the salt in the blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the oats, the dates, and the salt in the blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend until smooth. Don't overblend or the milk might get slimy. 30 seconds to 1 minute is enough.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend until smooth. Don't overblend or the milk might get slimy. 30 seconds to 1 minute is enough.

recipeInstructions.text: Strain the milk using a nut milk bag, a clean towel, dishcloth, or a strainer. Do not press the pulp to get more milk out as this will make the milk slimy as well.
recipeInstructions.name: Strain the milk using a nut milk bag, a clean towel, dishcloth, or a strainer. Do not press the pulp to get more milk out as this will make the milk slimy as well.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill into glass bottles or an airtight container and store in the fridge.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill into glass bottles or an airtight container and store in the fridge.
